intro: Mattie, a curious little girl with a great love for sweets, wakes up one day in a world made entirely of candies, chocolates and cookies.
description:
A DELICIOUSLY DANGEROUS VISUAL NOVEL

When Mattie stumbles into the mysterious Candy Kingdom, at first everything seems like a dream come true: mountains of cotton candy, rivers of chocolate and candies everywhere. But there's a problem... if she stays too long, she'll become just another candy!

With the help of Chicly, a talking bubble gum with a lot of personality, and an enchanted sugar map, Mattie must navigate this fantasy world, solving puzzles and avoiding deliciously tricky challenges. Can she resist the temptations and find the way out before it's too late?

Get ready for a story full of fun, magic and sweet surprises!

Key Features:

Unforgettable characters
·Mattie, a brave and curious protagonist.
·Chicly, a talking bubble gum who always has something to say.
·Sweet inhabitants, some friendly… and some not so much.

A magical, sugary world
·Licorice roads, cookie mountains and milkshake lakes.
·Sugar traps and sweet puzzles that will put Mattie to the test.

Vibrant colors and immersive music
·Scenarios full of details and bright colors.
·Catchy melodies that immerse children in the adventure.

A story with values and emotion
·Ingenuity, bravery and the importance of not being carried away by first impressions.
·A lesson in balance and decision-making.

A story for those who love adventure and sweets (but don't want to become one)!
